release_notes.en-US: Added support for the Target Milestone column in the tree view of e-mails.  Patch by James Socol.

release_notes.en-US: Contains a workaround for bug 586032 in the Bugzilla REST API.

release_notes.en-US: Fixes an issue with the Thunzilla (custom columns based on bugzilla headers) integration with virtual folders.

release_notes.en-US: Use the latest version of the API instead of a targeted one so the add-on does not become obsolete when an older one is deprecated.

release_notes.en-US:
• Removes unneeded code to handle an unrecognized cert (the old API server needed this, but it no longer does).
  • Uses a newer version of the API (0.4).
